summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Asset Management System MVP. Backend APIs fully functional with critical auto-status update logic working correctly. Frontend UI operational with minor dropdown interaction issue in assignment modal.

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown options not clickable in modal overlay - select elements in modal have visibility issues
ui_bugs.workaround: Backend API works correctly, issue is only with UI interaction

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby warnings in console for DialogContent components

passed_tests: Dashboard stats display (Total Assets, Assigned Assets, Available Assets, Total Employees)
Employee CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete)
Asset CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete)
Auto-status update logic - Asset status changes to 'Assigned' when assignment created
Auto-status update logic - Asset status changes to 'Available' when return date added
Auto-status update logic - Asset status changes to 'Available' when assignment deleted
Employee search functionality by name, ID, and department
Protected routes - redirect to login when not authenticated
Mobile responsive design - sidebar toggle works
Navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Employees, Assets, Assignments)
All backend API endpoints (32/32 tests passed)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix dropdown selection issue in assignment modal - options are not clickable due to modal overlay interaction. Consider using a different approach for select components in modals or add proper z-index/pointer-events handling.
